page.title: 18A BOY'S SYMINGTON SUNDAY
page.content: I got up around 9 o'clock, had my breakfast of cornflakes, toast and sausages and watched television, then at quarter to ten my mum went to her work .At 11:00 my big brother ,my dad my papa and I went to the golf at Caprington Municipal Golf Course while my gran cleaned up the house.After the golf we went to the Wheatsheaf for a drink of Cola for us and a pint of Tennents lager for the grownups.Back home for lunch-chicken salad.After lunch I watched football at Shaw Park till 4:30p.m.When my mum came home from her work at the Halfway Hotel we had our tea.After that I went to play Two Man Hunt,then I watched James Bond on T.V.Then I had my bath and my supper of toast and orange juice and went to bed at 10:30p.m. {
